  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect()
      The connect method for the server: Creates a new socket object and a network.ClientHandler thread for the connection.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      The disconnect method for the server: Closes the server socket, buffered-reader and buffered-writer objects.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      Servers main method: Creates the server socket and server objects and calls the connect method for connection with the clients.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments for the main method.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • canCreateGame

      public boolean canCreateGame(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Helper method for the %creategame command Generates error messages for the possible errors.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - Thread to handle client side actions.
      Returns:
      True, if a new games has been created, otherwise return false.

      Parameters:
      clientHandler - Thread to handle client side actions.
      Returns:
      Receive a message if a player can join a game.
